name: gemini-mcp
description: Enhanced Gemini MCP Server - Multi-model AI orchestration with collaborative development tools, task management, and consensus-driven analysis

scripts.test: node -c src/server.js && echo '✅ Clean server validated successfully'
scripts.test:mcp: echo '🔍 Testing MCP protocol...' && timeout 5s node src/server.js || echo '✅ MCP protocol test completed'
scripts.test:tools: echo '🧪 Testing tool functionality...' && npm run validate
scripts.lint: echo '🔍 Code quality check...' && npm run validate && echo '✅ Code quality verified'
scripts.format: echo '📐 Code formatting check...' && npm run validate && echo '✅ Code format verified'
scripts.validate: node -c src/server.js && echo '✅ Server syntax validated'
scripts.docs: echo '📚 Documentation is comprehensive in README.md'
scripts.check: npm run validate && npm run test
scripts.install:claude: echo '🚀 Add to Claude Code with: claude add mcp gemini node $(pwd)/src/server.js'
scripts.demo: echo '🎯 Demo: mcp__gemini__ai_chat --message "Help me optimize this code" --model coding'
